message.example: Successful creation occurred (via either POST or PUT)

204 - NO CONTENT.description: Indicates success but nothing is in the response body

message.example: Indicates success but nothing is in the response body, often used for DELETE and PUT operations.

400 - BAD REQUEST.description: The request would cause an invalid state

message.example: The request would cause an invalid state, Domain validation errors, missing data.

401 - UNAUTHORIZED.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

message.example: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

403 - FORBIDDEN.description: Error code for when the user is not authorized to perform the operation or the resource is unavailable for some reason.

message.example: Error code for when the user is not authorized to perform the operation or the resource is unavailable for some reason

405 - METHOD NOT ALLOWED.description: Requested URL exists, but the requested HTTP method is not applicable.

message.example: Requested URL exists, but the requested HTTP method is not applicable.
